name: uxoriously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows too much love or need for your wife: He plays a writer who is uxoriously in love with his radiant wife. He went on a long holiday with his wife, who is uxoriously referred to throughout this book.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was secure in his job, with a growing international reputation, and uxoriously contented with his wife.His wife, Helena, whom he treats less than uxoriously, becomes disturbed by the knowledge that there is a man who is her husband's double.
